element.short: Clinical symptoms/signs associated with the Event
element.definition: Clinical symptoms and/or signs that are observed or associated with the adverse reaction event.
element.comment: Manifestation can be expressed as a single word, phrase or brief description. For example: nausea, rash or no reaction. It is preferable that manifestation should be coded with a terminology, where possible. The values entered here may be used to display on an application screen as part of a list of adverse reactions, as recommended in the UK NHS CUI guidelines.  Terminologies commonly used include, but are not limited to, SNOMED CT or ICD10.

binding.description: Clinical symptoms and/or signs that are observed or associated with an Adverse Reaction Event.
